@graph.name: Privacy Policy - OptizenApp
@graph.description: Privacy policy for OptizenApp detailing data collection, usage, storage, and user rights regarding personal information and website interactions.

@graph.name: OptizenApp
@graph.description: Web application providing optimization tools and services with comprehensive privacy protection and data management features.
@graph.browserRequirements: Modern web browsers with JavaScript enabled
featureList: User comment system with spam detection

mainEntity.name: What personal data does OptizenApp collect?

acceptedAnswer.text: We collect data shown in comment forms, IP addresses, browser user agent strings, email addresses for Gravatar service, and any media uploaded to the website including potential location data.

mainEntity.name: How long does OptizenApp retain user data?

acceptedAnswer.text: Comments and metadata are retained indefinitely for automatic approval. User profile information is stored as long as the account exists. Various cookies have different retention periods from 1 day to 1 year.
We use cookies for comment convenience (1 year), temporary browser detection, login information (2 days), screen display choices (1 year), and post editing indicators (1 day).

mainEntity.name: What rights do users have over their data?

acceptedAnswer.text: Users can request exported files of their personal data, request data erasure, and manage their profile information. Website administrators can also access and edit user information.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Personal Data
hasDefinedTerm.description: Information that can identify an individual, including IP addresses, email addresses, comments, and user profile information.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Cookies
hasDefinedTerm.description: Small data files stored in browsers to remember user preferences, login status, and provide website functionality.

hasDefinedTerm.name: EXIF GPS Data
hasDefinedTerm.description: Location information embedded in image files that can reveal where photos were taken.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Gravatar Service
hasDefinedTerm.description: Third-party service that provides profile pictures based on email addresses across websites.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Data Retention
hasDefinedTerm.description: The period for which personal information is stored and maintained by the website.

itemListElement.name: Comment Data
itemListElement.description: Information provided when leaving comments including content, IP address, and browser details

itemListElement.name: Media Files
itemListElement.description: Images and other media uploaded by users, potentially containing location data

itemListElement.name: User Account Information
itemListElement.description: Profile data for registered users including personal information and preferences

itemListElement.name: Technical Data

itemListElement.name: Third-party Embedded Content

@graph.name: How to Manage Your Data on OptizenApp
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide for users to control their personal data and privacy settings.

step.name: Access Your Account
step.text: Log in to your OptizenApp account to access personal data management options.

step.name: View Personal Information
step.text: Navigate to your user profile to see, edit, or delete personal information stored in your account.

step.name: Request Data Export
step.text: Contact website administrators to request an exported file of all personal data held about you.

step.name: Request Data Deletion
step.text: Submit a request to erase personal data, excluding information required for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

step.name: Manage Cookie Preferences
step.text: Control cookie settings through your browser or opt-out of saving comment information in cookies.
